korean: 주문한 옷이 생각했던 거랑 완전 달라서 반품하기로 했다.
사진이랑 실물이 너무 차이 나서 실망스러웠어.
반품 신청하고 편의점에 맡기는 것도 일이네.
english: The clothes I ordered were completely different from what I expected, so I decided to return them.
I was disappointed because the photos and the actual product were so different.
Even requesting a return and dropping it off at the convenience store is a hassle.
Next time, I should read reviews more carefully.
